mapper.select: SELECT qna_no, q.member_no, qna_category, qna_title, member_name, SUBSTRING_INDEX(qna_create_date, ' ', 1) qna_create_date, q.qna_answer FROM `qna` q JOIN `member` m ON q.member_no = m.member_no WHERE q.member_no=#{memberNo} ORDER BY qna_create_date DESC

SELECT qna_no, q.member_no, qna_category, qna_title, member_name, SUBSTRING_INDEX(qna_create_date, ' ', 1) qna_create_date, q.qna_answer FROM `qna` q JOIN `member` m ON q.member_no = m.member_no WHERE q.member_no=#{memberNo} AND `${type}` LIKE '%${content}%' ORDER BY qna_create_date DESC
